events.message: I received my order last week, but the item is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund.
The case has been categorized under Refund as the customer requests money back for the received item.
The support case has been assigned to agent Emily R. to handle the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your order. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a brief description of the issue with the product?
The order number is 123456789. The product arrived damaged, and I am not satisfied, so I want to return it.
Thank you for the details. We can start the refund process immediately and provide you with a prepaid return shipping label.
Great, that sounds good to me. Please send the return label at your earliest convenience.
We have emailed you the prepaid return label. Once we receive the product, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm you were able to send back the item and to ask if you need any further assistance.
The refund case is now closed. Please feel free to contact us again if you have any other questions or issues.
